alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 11:39PM CDT until June 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHERN MITCHELL...JEWELL...EASTERN SMITH...NORTHEASTERN OSBORNE...SOUTHWESTERN NUCKOLLS AND SOUTHEASTERN WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 1139 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Lebanon to Esbon to near Cawker City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Glen Elder, Burr Oak and Ionia around 1150 PM CDT. Mankato and Guide Rock around 1155 PM CDT. Jewell and Montrose around 1200 AM CDT. Bostwick around 1205 AM CDT. Superior and Randall around 1210 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
